E'i hacche supratisthita bidhana, kaje'i edera madhye tomadera nijedera prati an'yaya karo na, ara musarikadera birud'dhe samabetabhabe yud'dha karo yemana tara samabetabhabe tomadera sathe yud'dha kare thake. Ara jene rekho -- allah alabat dharmabhirudera sange rayechena.
